title: Naruto, Ereader Ready, Chapters 1-633
description:
I wanted to read all the Naruto manga on my ereader but the only format available online was individual jpeg files. Reading them as individual jpegs is a royal pain in the ass IMO so I felt I needed to do something about it.

So what IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve done here is convert all the chapters from individual jpegs into pdfs. I didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t do the original work of translating or scanning, just converted them. Some of the pages that were two-page spreads in the manga are sideways to the rest of the document because of the way they were originally scanned. I didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have time to fix each individual sideways page due to time constraints. 

If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d like to take the time to rotate the sideways pages yourself, I can highly recommend PDFill to do pages individually. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a free program that allows you to edit PDFs in many different ways. Powerful and useful: http://www.pdfill.com/

Naruto chapters from 1 to 633 are included in this torrent. Please reseed and enjoy!
